thread.section_title: 1000Bulbs.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1000Bulbs.com | www.1000bulbs.com
thread.title: Dean Barrera

author: Dean Barrera
title: Dean Barrera
text: I buy a lot of light bulbs in my contracting business. Of course Im always looking for the best prices. I have used this site (1000bulbs) many times over the years because of pricing and ease of use ....the site is very well structured....everything is easy to find customer service is excellent....i do try and find the best price but always end up back at this site after checking the other places like Amazon, Lowes and Home Depot.
